page.title: 08PORTWAY UNIFORM
page.content: {The Portway School uniform}consists of a grey skirt, light blue blouse,tie and a royal blue jumper or cardigan for girls. For boys a pair of grey trousers, light blue shirt,tie and royal jumper.In the summer the girls wear a blue and white checked dress and again their royal blue jumper or cardigan. The boys wear their grey trousers or grey shorts,light blue shirtor a light blue t-shirt with Portway Junior written on the left hand side. In p.e. (physical education) the girls wear a leotard and/or a netball skirt which is a short skirt for sports, sometimes girls wear a t-shirt and shorts but some wear tracksuit trousers with a t-shirt.
